text: Yadi timi vimukha hunchau bhane juna sandesa mero hatabata timitira patha'i'eko cha, tyo maile timila'i purya'isakeko chu, ra mero palanakartale timro tha'umma aru manisaharula'i lya'i sthapita garnecha, ra timile allahako kehi noksani garna sakdainau. Mero palanakarta ta pratyeka kuramathi sanraksaka cha
